A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an utterly disappointing movie. Being surprising for no reason isn't authenticate or even interesting; it just plain sucks. The world is at your disposal in terms of plot and we get a slow motion death like something out of Austin Powers. And the movie straight up insults fan intelligence by assuming we aren't going to ask the question\, \"So why didn't Holdo just tell Poe her plan?\"\, removing the entirety of the sub-plot. If a sub-plot is dismantled that easily should it really make it into the movie?\n\nGood luck wrapping this up in one episode. The best bet would be to disregard and redo this movie correctly and then finish the series properly. Goddammit I'm disappointed. Goddammit.
